meanings.definition: Migrating up rivers from the sea to spawn.
meanings.sent1: Salmon are anadromous, swimming against the current to lay their eggs.
meanings.sent2: The eels anadromous journey begins in the ocean and ends in freshwater rivers.
meanings.sent3: The anadromous trout decided to take a detour and spawn in a swimming pool.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like an anadromous fish, always pushing forward against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The anadromous migration of the fish was a sight to behold, a natural wonder of perseverance.

meanings.definition: A fish that migrates up rivers from the sea to spawn.
meanings.sent1: The anadromous species in this river are crucial for the ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of anadromous fish to understand their life cycle.
meanings.sent3: The anadromous fish threw a party in the freshwater stream to celebrate their journey.
meanings.sent4: The anadromous fish, like tiny adventurers, embark on their upstream quest.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the anadromous fish leaping over waterfalls, a true spectacle of nature.
